text: The Adventured of Tintin or The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorns a 2011 New Zealand-American action-adventure movie. The film is based on three of Herg√©'s albums Crab with the Golden Claws, The Secret Unicorn, and Red Rackham's Treasure. It was directed by Steven Spielberg. It was produced by Peter Jackson and Kathleen Kennedy. It stars Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis, Daniel Craig, Nick Frost, Simon Pegg, and Enn Reitel. It was composed by John Williams. It was released on December 21, 2011. == Cast == * Jamie Bell as Tintin * Andy Serkis as Captain Haddock and Sir Francis Haddock * Daniel Craig as Ivan Ivanovitch Sakharine and Red Rackham * Nick Frost as Thomson * Simon Pegg as Thompson * Toby Jones as Aristides Silk * Daniel Mays as Allan * Gad Elmaleh as Omar ben Salaad * Mackenzie Crook as Tom Category:New Zealand action movies Category:2011 adventure movies Category:2010s mystery movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Steven Spielberg Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Nickelodeon Movies movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about treasure hunting Category:American buddy movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:2011 action movies Category:2010s epic movies Category:American epic movies Category:Movies based on comics Category:2010s 3D movies Category:IMAX movies Category:New Zealand adventure movies Category:Pirate movies
title: The Adventures of Tintin (movie)
